Hello Folks

I am in search of Oracle HCM Cloud Solution Archiect ( Two seperate role - 1) HCM with exp in OTL, payroll, 2) HCM- ORC, talent cloud, Absence management,

all these opportunities are remote

You can share resume directly at kailash.gautam@neerinfo.com

Role : Oracle HCM Cloud Solution Architect

Location Remote role

Fulltime role

Responsibilities:

- Overall responsibility of the end-to-end solution as lead solution architect for Oracle HCM Cloud focused opportunities which may include ERP Platforms, Applications, PaaS and IaaS, the end to end Oracle solution stack.

Experience HCM modules like Time and labor, Payroll, Absence Management

- Communicates and translates complex technical requirements into competitive client proposal offering an solution that addresses business needs

- Leverage experience and best practices, along with insights of competitors capability and behaviors; to support the sales strategy

- Work with teams to share the latest ERP Cloud offerings and trends released in the market

- Support client facing activities related to business development, sales and solution development at the C-suite and Director Levels on the Oracle Platform

- Collaboratively work across ecosystems (sales, delivery, and partners)

- Able to lead a team of experts across the IT value stack
